What about my choices? Fact Sheet

What about my choices? Fact Sheet

This one page fact sheet discusses abortion methods, parenting options and adoption options for a pregnant woman.



How will you be using this?


Please allow 2-3 weeks for shipping. For Expedited Shipping call (651)-484-1040. Each publication costs 30 cents to design, print and ship. Select the suggested donation amount of $0.30 cents to help us with these expenses or $0 for no donation at this time. HLA services and materials are free for your use.   • Copyright Human Life Alliance 2017

Human Life Alliance promotes awareness of the inherent dignity and personhood of human life, born and preborn, without exception or compromise. Human Life Alliance proclaims and defends a culture of life and chastity through education, social and political awareness and life-affirming alternatives to abortion, infanticide, assisted suicide and euthanasia. Human Life Alliance accomplishes its mission in a spirit of prayer and non-violence.
